ID.name: ID
ID.description: A guid that is the unique identifier of the purchase invoice.

Amount.name: Amount
Amount.description: The amount including VAT in the foreign currency.

AmountDC.name: AmountDC
AmountDC.description: The amount including VAT in the default currency.

AmountDiscount.name: AmountDiscount
AmountDiscount.description: Discount amount in the default currency of the company

AmountDiscountExclVat.name: AmountDiscountExclVat
AmountDiscountExclVat.description: Discount amount excluding VAT in the default currency of the company

AmountFCExclVat.name: AmountFCExclVat
AmountFCExclVat.description: Amount exclude VAT in the currency of the transaction.

ContactPerson.name: ContactPerson
ContactPerson.description: Guid identifying the contact person of the supplier.

Currency.name: Currency
Currency.description: The code of the currency of the invoiced amount.

Document.name: Document
Document.description: Guid identifying a document that is attached to the invoice.

DueDate.name: DueDate
DueDate.description: The date before which the invoice has to be paid. This by default will be set according to the payment condition.

EntryNumber.name: EntryNumber
EntryNumber.description: The unique number of the purchase invoice. The entry number is based on a setting in the purchase journal and incremented for each new purchase invoice.

ExchangeRate.name: ExchangeRate
ExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the invoice currency and the default currency of the division.

FinancialPeriod.name: FinancialPeriod
FinancialPeriod.description: The financial period in which the invoice is entered.

FinancialYear.name: FinancialYear
FinancialYear.description: The financial year in which the invoice is entered.

InvoiceDate.name: InvoiceDate
InvoiceDate.description: The date on which the supplier entered the invoice.

Journal.name: Journal
Journal.description: The code of the purchase journal in which the invoice is entered.

Modified.name: Modified
Modified.description: The date and time the invoice was last modified.

PaymentCondition.name: PaymentCondition
PaymentCondition.description: The code of the payment condition that is used to calculate the due date and discount.

PaymentReference.name: PaymentReference
PaymentReference.description: Unique reference to match payments and invoices.

PurchaseInvoiceLines.name: PurchaseInvoiceLines
PurchaseInvoiceLines.description: The collection of lines that belong to the purchase invoice.

Remarks.name: Remarks
Remarks.description: The user can enter remarks related to the invoice here.

Source.name: Source
Source.description: Indicates the origin of the invoice. 1 Manual entry, 3 Purchase invoice, 4 Purchase order, 5 Web service.

Status.name: Status
Status.description: The status of the invoice. 10 Draft, 20 Open, 50 Processed.

Type.name: Type
Type.description: Indicates the type of the purchase invoice. 8030 Direct purchase invoice, 8031 Direct purchase invoice (Credit), 8033 Purchase invoice, 8034 Purchase invoice (Credit)

VATAmount.name: VATAmount
VATAmount.description: The total VAT amount of the purchase invoice.

Warehouse.name: Warehouse
Warehouse.description: Guid that identifies the warehouse that will receive the purchased goods. This is mandatory for creating a direct purchase invoice except for Exact Online Projects.

YourRef.name: YourRef
YourRef.description: The invoice number provided by the supplier.

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to create, read, update and delete purchase invoices.A purchase invoice describes the items that you purchased from a supplier. This endpoint supports purchase invoices and direct purchase invoices. Each purchase invoice line has to contain either an item or a purchase order line.The direct purchase invoice is a purchase invoice and receipt at the same time. A purchase order is not required and the stock positions and financial entries are updated directly.To create a direct purchase invoice you have to specify the warehouse that is receiving the purchased items. To get only direct purchase invoices apply this filter on warehouse: $filter=Warehouse ne nullCurrently project WBS (work breakdown structure) and rebilling functionality are not supported.For more information about the purchase invoice functionality in Exact Online, see Create purchase invoices.
